author: andschwa
body: This replaces #1019 to resolve #1016. The original PR was made from a fork, which due to authentication problems, can't pass CI (see #1028). Thanks for your work @jkotas! --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1029)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @jkotas I added you to the team with write access so next time you can push directly here and I don't have to migrate the branch. Such is life with private repos!

title: Switch from AssemblyLoadContext.InitializeDefaultContext to AssemblyLoadContext.Resolving event
